name: resonance
content:
resonance noun
(SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the quality of being loud and clear
[ C or U ]
  physics
  specialized the production of a sound as a result of vibration (= shaking) of another object: magnetic resonance

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Sounds made by objects, movement or impact
resonance noun
(QUALITY)
[ C or U ] a feeling, thought, memory, etc. that a piece of writing or music makes you have, or the quality in a piece of writing, etc. that makes this happen: This poem has many resonances for me.
